modName: New Types Of Mead Plus Recipes
summary: Six new type of beverages and two unique drinks plus the recipes to make them...
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds into the game:
6 new beverages, called \"juice\" 
Jazbay juice, Cabbage Juice, Carrot Juice, Juniper Juice, SnowBerry juice, Vodka (Hell Yeah)
2 new unique drinks, \"Magic Liquor\" and \"Firebrande Inflamed Liquor\"
Recipes to make the all this beverages

It also add a lillte settlement behind Breezehome (Whiterun), where you can find the items in a kiosk and behind this kiosk you can find a Cookpot to cook the new recipe.
I will not post the image with the new effects of the beverages, because I\'m not english (I hope to not make mistakes XD) but you will be sure that I add new effects (that i can also change, if they are too inappropriate)

RECIPES:
Jazbay Juice requires 3 jazbay grapes
Cabbage Juice requires 1 cabbage
Carrot juice requires 3 carrots
Juniper Juice requires 3 juniper grapes
Snowberry juice requires 2 Snowberries
Vodka requires 4 potatoes
Magic Liquor requires 1 void salt, 1 frost salt, 1 fire salt, 1 bunch of salt (normal salt)
Firebrand Inflamed Liquore requires 1 bottle of Nord Mead and 2 fire salts
(I also have added a version of Firebrand without Nord Mead)

----ISTALLATION----
Extract the .zip thant copy the .esp file  and the Texture and the Meshes Folder into your Data Game Folder.

----BUGS----
no one find.

----TOOLS USED----
NifSkope
Paint.Net
Creation Kit

If you like the mod, rate it and leave a comment.
I will provide to make more imes (maybe something edible :P)
Enjoy,


Delta401
author: Delta401
